title: Interpretation of a dream about applying makeup to someone else in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about makeup for another person in a dream In case you want to know the interpretation of a dream about makeup for another person in a dream, one of the dreams that many wanted to know is the interpretation of this dream. The site has nothing to do with interpretations, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream about applying makeup to another person in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is applying makeup to another person in the dream, perhaps it indicates that some flaws are hidden in that person, and God knows best. Dreaming about someone else’s makeup, the dream may indicate that they are a disabled person and should be kept away from them. Seeing another person wearing makeup in a dream could mean that the dreamer will be exposed to deception and lies, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing another person wearing makeup in a dream indicates an imbalance. The dreamer needs to ask God for help, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about putting an earring on the nose in a dream: Putting the neck over the nose in a dream may mean that the dreamer has great interest in himself at that moment. In the event that a nose nail is seen in a dream, this may indicate a promotion in A good job or event will happen to the dreamer, thanks to God. Seeing a pierced nose in a dream may indicate bad news for the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about putting in artificial teeth in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that he is putting in artificial teeth in a dream may indicate the great goodness that It will come to the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing the installation of artificial teeth in a dream is evidence of the kindness and love that surrounded the vision in his life at that time. Seeing the installation of artificial teeth in a dream may mean the end of the adversities and fears that the dreamer faced in her life during those Days. Dreaming of placing artificial teeth in a dream may indicate positive changes that occur in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of placing dental fillings in a dream: Seeing dental fillings in a dream may indicate support and assistance in the vision’s needs in his life. In the event that you see The position of dental fillings in a dream, this may indicate advice that the dreamer needs from family and friends. Seeing the placement of dental fillings in a dream can indicate important things in the dreamer’s life that need to be preserved. If one sees himself placing dental fillings in a dream, it may indicate This is due to the great effort made by the dreamer to achieve his goals, thanks to God. Interpretation of the dream of applying henna to the hand in a dream: Seeing the application of henna in a dream may indicate many joys and happiness that come to the dreamer’s life at that time. In the event that one sees that he is applying henna to his hand In a dream, this may indicate joys and happiness coming to the dreamer at that time, thanks to God. Seeing henna applied to one’s hand in a dream may indicate the collapse of worries and crises from the dreamer’s life to a large extent during that period. Seeing henna on the hand may indicate The dream indicates the near relief that the dreamer will receive during the coming period, thanks to God. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead person angry in a dream

preview.html: Seeing dead people in a dream carries many connotations and interpretations that vary depending on the situation in which the person sees the dead person. Is he happy, sad, angry, alive? Does he give the researcher anything, does he take anything from him? In this article we will present the interpretation of the dream of seeing a dead sloth in a dream. The interpretation of the dream of seeing a dead person upset in a dream. Seeing the deceased unhappy, angry, or wearing old and torn clothes. It indicates that they are not well in the afterlife. Seeing an angry and sick dead person in a dream means that he is burdened with sins. Seeing an angry dead person in a dream symbolizes that the seeker is doing many wrong things that anger that dead person, or that the dreamer is harming his relatives, which does not please that dead person. If we dream of many dead people in a dream wearing unclean clothes and feeling very sad, this means that the student will become very poor or that one of his relatives will commit an inappropriate act. When one sees a dead person crying in a dream after being happy, this indicates that The dead person committed an indecency in his life and did not die in the religion of Islam. Seeing a dead person in his dream that he never knew and this dead person is sad means that the person who had the vision is a good person who fears God and enjoins good and forbids evil and does not respond to those who push and encourage him. To commit sins. Seeing a dead person sad and unwilling to speak in his dream means that this dead person is dissatisfied with his position as a student, and as a result he will do something that will endanger his life and expose him to many problems. Interpretation of seeing a dead person crying in a dream: Dreaming that a dead person is screaming in a loud voice. Loud indicates the torment of that dead person, and if the dead person cries and screams loudly, this indicates that this dead person is subjected to severe torture and needs someone to contact him. Mercy and kindness is to give his soul to escape from torment. A man who sees his dead wife crying in a dream indicates that she was not satisfied with her previous life with him and did not forgive him for what happened to her even after her death. A woman who sees her dead husband crying in a dream symbolizes his intense anger. On her for what she did in the evil deeds that angered him and hurt him while he was alive. A girl’s dream that her deceased father is crying intensely indicates his sadness for her because of her poverty and her intense need. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the deceased in a dreamInterpretation of seeing the dead in a dreamSeeing death in a dream symbolizes the end of a stage of life and a change in In it. Seeing a dead person entering the home of a sick person means that his illness will be prolonged or he will die soon. If a person sees himself digging the grave of a deceased acquaintance, this means that he will follow in his footsteps in worldly and religious matters, but if the stranger’s grave is unknown, this means that he will continue to do so. . So. Do something that does not work. Seeing someone carrying himself in a dream carrying a corpse in any way other than the known way of carrying a coffin or a corpse means that he will carry a heavy burden of forbidden money or lose all his money due to a forbidden act. If one sees himself in a dream carrying a corpse in a manner If the dream is normal, it means that he will take on some new responsibilities. Seeing the deceased who had a good personality is...

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream. If you are looking for what dreams bring, we present below the interpretation of a dream about the Prophet Joseph in a dream and what it means according to what was narrated by interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dreamInterpretation of Dreams Seeing the Prophet Joseph in a dream can be a sign of liberation. Of problems and worries, God willing. Likewise, if a married woman sees the Prophet Joseph, this may lead to goodness, and God knows the unseen. If a prisoner sees the Prophet Joseph in a dream, this may be evidence of his release from his prison, God willing. If a married woman sees the Prophet Joseph, this may be evidence. On goodness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Prophet Ibrahim in a dream. The interpretation of the dream of seeing the Prophet Ibrahim in a dream can be an indication of sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a married woman sees the Prophet Ibrahim, this can lead to goodness and happiness, and God knows the unseen. It can also be expressed by the vision of an unmarried girl. The Prophet Abraham by following the path of guidance, and God knows the unseen. When you see the wife of the Prophet Abraham divorced, it may be a sign of good offspring, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of seeing the Prophet Jesus in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of seeing the Prophet Jesus in a dream. Talking with our Master Moses, peace be upon him, can lead to the truth of the matter, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a picture of the Prophet Jesus can also express a wise son for you, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees the Prophet Jesus in a dream, this may be evidence of goodness and care, God Almighty is All-Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees the Prophet Jesus, this can lead to achieving goals, God willing, and being promoted to a prestigious position, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet Moses in a dreamInterpretation of dreams about seeing the Prophet Moses in a dream could be a sign of victory, and God has All knowledge: Seeing the Prophet Moses can also express love and understanding between spouses, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees the Prophet Moses, this may mean that she will be freed from worry and anxiety, and God Almighty knows. When he sees a divorced woman, the Prophet Moses can be relieved of his worries, and God knows best. Interpretation The dream of seeing the Prophet Job in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Prophet Job in a dream could be a sign of sadness, and if you are patient, you will receive reward and blessings from God, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the Prophet Job in a dream, it may be a sign of goodness and comfort, God willing. In the event that the young man sees Prophet Job in a dream, this indicates goodness and care, and God knows the unseen. It may also herald goodness for the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Prophet Jacob in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Prophet Jacob in a dream could be evidence of getting rid of worries, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees Prophet Jacob This can lead to achieving goals, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the Prophet Jacob for an unmarried girl can express her freedom from psychological crises, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. In the event that a married man sees the Prophet

title: Interpretation of the number 3 in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the number 3 in a dream in detail. Dreams are always known for their ambiguity and carry many secrets that portend certain things in a person’s life. Dreams are a gift from the gods that they send to the minds of people while they sleep to tell them certain things in their real lives. Even today, man still tries to know all the symbols and meanings of dreams, to understand what they symbolize in his life and the mysteries that the future holds for him. We find that our daily life is never devoid of Use numbers, whether you are at home or in the study place as well as at work. You will find yourself using counting and statistics with numbers in everything, but have you ever thought about knowing what numbers mean in dreams? This is what we will review with you in the following article entitled (Interpretation of the number 3 in a dream) from the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of the number 3 in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the number 3 in a dream by Ibn SirinMuhammad Ibn Sirin confirmed in his book The Interpretation of Great Dreams, however, that seeing the number 3 in a person’s dream is one of the good things to see. A matter or news that makes him happy and comforts his heart, so the number 3 always indicates good luck and affairs, goodness in the life of the visionary. When one sees the number 3 in his dream, it foretells stability in his family and family life and hearing a lot of good news soon, and it also indicates achieving a lot Of the hopes and aspirations in the life of the visionary God. Ready. Interpretation of the number 3 in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Sirin stated that seeing the number 3 for a married woman varies depending on the state she was in when she saw it. It could also indicate the appearance of separation from her husband in the event of multiple marital problems between them, so her life will be full of despair and sadness. Whereas if A married woman was happy when she saw the number 3, as this indicates the stability of her life, and that she will enjoy a happy married life without any problems in the future, and that she has a great place in her husband’s heart. Interpretation number 3 for individuals. Seeing the number 3 in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the spread of calm and stability in her life and future. It also indicates that she will begin a new life full of activity, distinction, and success in her studies or work. The number 3 in a person’s dream can indicate good news that makes his heart happy, such as marrying a good-hearted person who will make his heart happy, God willing, and enjoy a stable and happy married life with him. Interpretation of the number 3 in a dream for a pregnant woman. Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing the number 3 in a pregnant woman’s dream is a happy thing, as it will have an indication of an easy and smooth birth without pain or suffering. Her next life, God willing. Therefore, we reviewed with you the interpretation of Ibn Sirin to see the number 3 in the dream in detail, and to interpret a new dream, you can visit the application of direct interpretation of dreams from the encyclopedia.

title: Interpretation of a dream about greeting the dead for single people

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing peace upon the dead in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is greeting the dead, and she is very happy. It explains that she will marry a good and righteous man soon in her life, God willing. An unmarried woman who sees that a stranger she does not know is forcing her to greet The dead in a dream. It shows that she will achieve something that she tried hard for in her life during this time. And the unmarried girl who looks at the dead in a dream and does not know him and receives him. The clearest meaning is that she will obtain in her life many good things and an abundance of sustenance, God willing. And if the girl sees For a married woman in a dream, the deceased received her in the dream, with a warm greeting. It indicates that she missed the deceased very much, and that she missed visiting him in his grave, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the dead visiting the house. Interpretation of greeting the dead in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that the deceased He approached her and wanted to greet her. It indicates that she will live in a period full of goodness and abundant nourishment in her life at this time. A married woman who looks at her husband sitting next to the dead and greets him announces that she will face a new problem in her life and that she will be very happy for him, God willing, and God knows best. If a married woman sees the unknown dead person in a dream, he extends his hand and greets her. This is a sign that she will get rid of a debt she owes in her life and will live comfortably. If a married woman looks at the dead person and greets her, and greets her in the dream. This is a sign that she will achieve some of the goals that she dreams of and seeks. Striving to achieve it in her life. Interpretation of greeting the dead in a dream for a divorced woman. If a woman sees a divorced woman, she greets the deceased, and greets her divorced man while he is sitting next to him. This indicates that he will return to the divorced woman again, and live with him for a period full of happiness. And if the divorced woman looks at the dead man in the dream, He extends his hand and greets her in the dream. Here is a clear explanation that she will experience some good things in her life, God willing. And if a divorced woman sees in a dream that the deceased wanted to greet him in the dream, this is a clear explanation that she will live in a calm and problem-free period in her life. As for the divorced person who looks at the dead In a dream, he greets him while he is hot. It announces the happy things that this divorced woman will see soon, God willing, in her life. Interpretation of seeing greetings over the dead in a man’s dream and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the deceased gave him a warm greeting in the dream. It indicates the happy things that He sees it, and this dreamer lives in his life, God willing. And seeing that the dreamer received the unknown dead person in the dream and felt happy. The meaning indicates the good things that he will obtain and which he has been searching for for a long time. And the dreamer who sees the unknown dead person in the dream, so approach him and greet him. And before him. The meaning indicates that this dreaming man will get married in the coming period and live happily. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is looking at the deceased, approaching him and greeting him in the dream. This indicates the happy things that this person will approach.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about an unmarried woman marrying a person known to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a single woman marrying a familiar person: Many girls dream of the day when the dream knight comes on his white horse as a knight and a famous person asking to marry her. The dream of an unmarried person marrying a well-known person carries with it many clues and interpretations, some of which are considered good news that give hope and optimism, and others The other warns of an imminent problem that may last for a long time if you do not pay attention to the coming period. What is the interpretation? Are you dreaming of marrying a well-known person? This vision basically carries many and varied connotations, which range between good and evil, and its interpretation depends on the characteristics of the newlyweds, the engagement, and the general atmosphere For joy, as well as the character of an unmarried woman who gets married, and what is known: Positive meanings: If both of them are happy and joy permeates the atmosphere of the place, then this is good news that the dreamer will achieve something wonderful or reach a goal that she is keen to achieve, or that she will soon hear a lot of news Happy about her field of work or study, perhaps for a job she recently applied for. Sometimes it can indicate new ideas and beliefs that happened to this woman, making her see life in general from a different point of view that carries great faith and hope for the coming days. It also expresses that he will change The path of his life is largely in order to achieve a specific goal or reach the desired goal. It also indicates the future that holds for this girl many surprising events that she did not expect or think about, which will lead to strengthening her character and she will take positive steps towards the future. But if she sees That her wedding was very happy and noisy, this can be expressed by several indicators depending on the feelings, attitude and behavior of each of them in this happy atmosphere. If the groom is happy and looks at the bride with pride and love, this indicates that he will marry a famous and well-known person and she will also receive Her share of glory. But if the groom leaves or disappears and does not complete the ceremony, this is a sign that he will fall into a trap with someone who claims love and adoration just to satisfy their desires and will not marry her. But if the marriage takes place without joy or marriage or with only witnesses, this may indicate A bad relationship with a young man who contradicts the principles and rules of sound religion. Negative concepts: If her husband is known for his bad qualities, but she sees that she is marrying him, this is evidence that she is doing things against her will, or being forced to do what she does not like. It can also express That there is an event that will happen to her soon, and it will bring about many changes in the totality of matters in her life, so she needs to quickly adapt and arrange her cards again. If this person is known and has feelings of love and affection, this indicates that she is looking forward to the moment that will bring them together in married life. Happy. But if she sees that she is marrying her lover, but in a simple atmosphere that does not fill her with joy and happiness, this may indicate that she will marry him without the approval of her family. Sometimes this vision is a warning to the single woman, if she feels different looks in the eyes of the presenter.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing electrical cables in a dream complete?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you a complete interpretation of seeing electrical cables in a dream. It is known that electric cables supply power to poles, roads and homes and are one of the most important basics in our lives. Electricity in a dream is a whole topic for many people. What is the interpretation of seeing electrical wires connected, as we accompanied you, dear followers, what is the interpretation of seeing electrical wires burning, and its meaning and evidence from the books of major scholars of interpretation and vision. In the dream you must continue. What is the interpretation of electrical cables in a complete dream? The interpretation of electrical cables in a dream is complete evidence that the dreamer will get rid of all his problems and fears. Seeing power lines on the road in a complete dream means travel and journey, as well as moving from a place To another. The dream of grabbing electrical cables also indicates difficult days that the owner of this dream is going through. Connecting electrical cables in a complete dream means a lot of problems and family and marital disputes. Seeing a complete climbing of an electrical pole in a dream is the fulfillment of goals and the fulfillment of desires and aspirations. What Interpretation of seeing electrical wires connected? Seeing electrical wires connected in a dream means family communication and putting an end to problems and means goodness and contentment. Interpretation of seeing electrical cables connected to homes indicates to the dreamer about the high position he will obtain in his work. Seeing that wires are connected in the wrong way in a dream indicates Continuous mistakes that this person does not learn from. If you see the entire electrical cable connected to the TV in a dream, this indicates a high position, status, and achieving goals. What is the interpretation of seeing electrical wires burning? The interpretation of seeing electrical cables burning in a dream is one of the unwanted visions that indicate Illness and extreme exhaustion. Burning electrical wires in an entire dream is a sign of difficult days and tiring stages that the dreamer will experience. Also, seeing fire on electrical wires in a dream is full of dreams that indicate sadness, delusion, and pain. Completely extinguishing a fire in a dream is a harbinger of goodness, happiness, and an end. For all the problems and obstacles that the dreamer was facing. What is the interpretation of seeing an electrical wire being cut? Seeing yourself cutting electrical wires on the road in a complete dream is a sign of the problems and difficulties that the dreamer will face. Also, seeing a married man completely cutting an electrical wire in a dream indicates his problems. Marriage and his divorce from his wife. Seeing this dream in the dreams of the girl with the pot indicates the end of her relationship with the person in her life. What is the interpretation of seeing electrical wires burning for poor women? Seeing electrical wires burning in a dream is considered complete for a woman as a pot of unwanted dreams that indicate her failure in Life. Also, seeing an electrical cable burning in the path of the girl who facilitates it means that there are many haters and envious people. The complete interpretation of seeing an electrical short circuit in a dream: Seeing an electrical short circuit indicates...

title: Interpretation of kitchen in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: In today's article, we present to you the interpretation of the kitchen in a dream. The kitchen is one of the basic elements in every home, and there is no home without it. Since every woman spends a lot of time in the kitchen preparing food, she sometimes sees the kitchen in her dream, and the visions come not only to women but also to men. Also, whoever sees the kitchen in his dream does not know the meaning of this dream, and whether it is good or evil, and from the following lines from the encyclopedia we will learn about the most important things that came regarding the interpretation of the dream in the kitchen for singles, married people, pregnant women and men. Interpretation of the kitchen in a dreamInterpretation of the kitchen in a dream for a single womanScientists believe The interpretation is that seeing a single girl in the kitchen in her dream is merely an expression of her psychological state during the dream. If a single woman dreams of a clean and tidy kitchen, then her dream indicates that she enjoys psychological stability and calm at this time. Whereas if the kitchen in the single woman’s dream is dirty And chaotically, her dreams show that she is going through a bad psychological state. Whoever sees in her dream that she is standing in the kitchen preparing food, this is good news for achieving what she desires and achieving the ambitions she seeks, and it could be an indication of a state of stability. Experienced by the dreamer. To dream of a kitchen that contains the latest cooking equipment is evidence that God Almighty will achieve for the dreamer what he wants to happen. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman in the kitchenIf a married woman dreams of a kitchen full of the latest cooking equipment, her dream indicates that she She lives in luxury, prosperity, and a distinguished financial level. A married woman’s vision of a spacious kitchen indicates that she enjoys a lot of food and money. As for seeing a narrow kitchen in a dream, it is a sign that she is suffering from distress and financial problems in her life. One of the most promising visions is a dream of a clean kitchen for a married woman, because It indicates a change in the dreamer’s family life for the better. But if a married woman dreams of a dirty kitchen full of insects, then her dream indicates that she is suffering from family problems and concerns and that she is struggling to make a living. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in the kitchen in a dream: The symbol of the kitchen in general in The dream of a pregnant woman refers to the period of pregnancy that she is going through. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is cleaning and heating the kitchen, this means that her due date is approaching and that her birth will proceed without problems. This dream also indicates that the dreamer lives in a state of family, psychological and financial stability. Interpretation A man’s dream of a kitchen: The kitchen in a man’s dream symbolizes his source of livelihood. If a man dreams of a clean and tidy kitchen, his dream indicates that he earns a lawful living. But if a man dreams of a dirty and messy kitchen, his dream indicates that he follows illegal methods to earn a living. Whoever sees in His dream is that he is standing in the kitchen preparing food, then this is good news that God Almighty will give him goodness at work or at home. If a man dreams that his family members are eating from the food that he prepared in the kitchen, then this is a sign that there is kindness on the way to him. In general, the kitchen indicates in The man dreamed that he was S

title: Interpretation of a dream about a ship or a ship in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a ship or ship in a dream. A ship or ship is a means of transportation by sea and can be for traveling, walking, or transporting goods and goods to other places. When you see a ship in a dream, this means many things, including good and others, and through this article we learn together about the most important of these interpretations in the dream of a man, woman, and unmarried girl. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream Interpretation of a dream about a ship by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing a ship or ship in a dream When you see driving A ship in a dream, this expresses the high status of the pioneer and the high position he occupies. Also, driving a car in a person’s dream indicates the approaching marriage. And when one sees a ship in a sick person’s dream, this represents recovery and stopping problems. And when one sees a large ship in his dream , it represents abundant money coming to him. If a person sees in a dream that he is riding a ship amid huge waves, this expresses the problems and crises that the dreamer faces. Seeing a ship full of people in a dream expresses the benefits and goodness that will come to the pioneer. Seeing a ship in a dream expresses About the goals that the viewer can achieve and reach. Boarding a ship in the dreamer’s dream indicates that the dreamer will be able to achieve something that he desires to achieve. Seeing a small boat portends success. Read also: Penguin in a dreamSeeing a ship in a married woman’s dreamWhen she sees a ship in a dream For a married woman, it shows good things coming to her, and a lot of food. Also, seeing a ship in a dream expresses her feeling of stability and reassurance that she experiences in her life with her husband. Seeing a ship in a dream for a married woman indicates changes that are occurring in her life for the better. As Seeing a ship in a married woman’s dream indicates the good news that she will receive. Also, seeing a ship indicates one’s righteous offspring. Also, her vision of riding on a ship expresses the goals that she can reach and the ability to achieve. Read also: Washing the dead. Seeing a ship in a dream An unmarried girl: When an unmarried girl sees a ship in a dream, this indicates the approach of her husband. Seeing a ship in an unmarried girl’s dream also expresses the achievement of her goals and what she wants to achieve. Also, the dream of an unmarried girl boarding a ship indicates the goodness that will come to her. It also expresses About the changes that are occurring in her life and makes her feel optimistic. Also, seeing it expresses a strong will and self-confidence. Interpretation of a dream about a ship for a man: Seeing a ship in a man’s dream represents kindness and sustenance that comes to the dreamer. As for seeing a ship sinking in a dream, it indicates the emergence of problems and crises in the life of a man. The dreamer. Boarding a ship for a single person in a dream indicates the approaching marriage. In a patient’s dream, seeing a ship symbolizes his recovery from illness. Likewise, a ship in a dream expresses the journey and livelihood that comes through it. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. Seeing a boat trip. In a dream: When you see a ship in a dream, this is...

title: Interpretation of seeing a young man in a dream Seeing a young girl in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a young man in a dream: single, married, pregnant, divorced, handsome, unknown or well-known, tall or short, white, brown, blond and more, according to Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi and Imam al-Sadiq. Seeing a young man in a dream is an enemy of a man, if he is white then he is a hidden enemy. If it is brown, then it is a rich enemy, and if it is blond, then it is an enemy. For an old man. If he is a diurnal person, then he is an honest enemy, and if he is a villager, then he is a rude enemy. If he sees that he is following a young man, he will be victorious over his enemy, and if the young man follows him, his enemy will defeat him. If he sees an unknown young man and hates him, an enemy who hates people will appear to him. If he sees a young man supervising him, then he is an enemy who has succeeded. Whoever grows up and sees that he has become young will miss him terribly. A young man is an enemy, and he is cunning and deceitful, or a hated enemy, and seeing him shows movement, power, and the control of ignorance, and perhaps it shows a blessing and thanks to God Almighty. A young woman: Seeing a beautiful young woman is evidence of good news. A young man: Tell his vision of movement and power. A young man in a dream is a man’s enemy, even if he is white. It is a hidden enemy. If it is brown, then it is a rich enemy. If it is blond, then it is an enemy of an old man. If it is a daylight, then it is a loyal enemy. If it is a villager, then it is a shameless enemy. If it is strong, then it is due to the intensity of its hostility. If it is unknown, if it is known, then it is strong. If it is weak, then its strength is weak, and it is the one who follows a young man. His enemy will triumph over him. Whoever sees an unknown young man and hates him will show him an enemy that people hate. Everyone who loves him will see him as an enemy he loves. Whoever sees a young man who ignores him is an enemy who can defeat him because he is high. Whoever dreams that he has become young and old will lose a lot, and the young man is an enemy, because when he reaches adulthood he does not listen to the words of the one who commands and forbids him. The young man is a cunning enemy and a hated deceiver. Ibn Sirin sees a man in a dream - YouTube
